addr: 525 South Hewitt Street Los Angeles, CA 90013
title: La Kretz Innovation Campus Walking Tour and Info Session
desc: Join us at La Kretz Innovation Campus for a presentation and walking tour offered exclusively for LACI portfolio companies and potential strategic partners. La Kretz Innovation Campus is LA?s new cleantech hub - a place where entrepreneurs, engineers, scientists and policymakers can collaborate, promote and support the development of clean technologies and LA?s innovation economy. ? A fully renovated 60,000 square foot building located at 5th and Hewitt Streets in the dynamic Arts District of Downtown Los Angeles, this impressive facility features open workspace and private offices, conference rooms and event space. Explore the prototype manufacturing workshop, the wet lab and electronics lab, a training center with classroom space, and the LADWP Energy Efficiency Labs and Customer Engagement Center, all under one roof. The Campus is directly adjacent to the site of a new Arts District Park and will offer surface parking with a 175 kilowatt photovoltaic solar canopy, grey water filtration, bioswale, and microgrid systems, all in the heart of LA?s Cleantech Corridor. If you?re searching for a sustainable work environment, space to demonstrate and collaborate, with flexibility and room to grow, join the community at La Kretz Innovation Campus. Sign up for a tour today! Please note that tour spots are limited. The site is still under construction and appropriate clothing is required, including closed-toed shoes.
